title: Foundations of Deep Learning-Based Holographic Antenna Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Project-based course learning radio engineering technologies applicable to real-life scenarios. Hands-on practice with personal devices and fostering collaborative learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles of holographic antennas and the OAM (orbital angular momentum) generation mechanism
Learners can implement a process to optimize surface impedance parameters using deep learning models
Learners can complete a project to achieve a target radiation pattern based on a generated dataset
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
